game.title: The Lost Temple
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the lost temple.
game.description: The lost temple is said to contain an ancient artifact of great power. Retrieving it will grant you a significant boost in reputation and gold.

task.objective: Gather information about the temple's location.
task.description: Speak to local villagers and gather any information they may have about the lost temple's whereabouts.

task.objective: Explore the temple and find the artifact.
task.description: Make your way through the temple, solving puzzles and fighting off traps to reach the artifact.
